prompt: What are some free AI tools for audio transcription?

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some free AI-powered audio transcription tools you can use: Fully free or free tier online tools Otter.ai – AI meeting & audio transcription with a free Basic plan (limited monthly minutes). Wikipedia+1

sources.title: Audio & Video Transcription. Powered by AI.
sources.snippet: Transcribe audio and video in 100+ languages with just a few clicks! Riverside's transcriber offers accurate AI transcriptions completely free!

citation_mappings.claim_text: Riverside Transcription – Free browser AI audio/video transcription. Riverside

sources.title: Free Transcription Tool
sources.snippet: Easily convert your conversations, audio files, or YouTube videos into text for free with our advanced transcription tool.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Deepgram Free Transcription – Online AI transcription with support for many languages. Deepgram
Notta – AI transcription in dozens of languages; free options available. Notta
TurboScribe – Free audio & video to text transcription. TurboScribe
transcribe.mov – Free online audio/video transcription. Transcribe
Breev – Free online transcription with no sign-up required. breev.ai
UniScribe – Upload audio/video or paste a link for free transcription. UniScribe
Notegpt.io audio-to-text – Free instant audio file to text converter. NoteGPT
Other free / low-cost options Descript – Offers free AI transcription with editing features. descript.com
Speechnotes – Online speech-to-text tool good for dictation/transcription. speechnotes.co

sources.title: Transcribe audio with Google Gemini for free - here's how to do it
sources.snippet: Google Gemini now offers a free tool for transcribing audio files up to 10 minutes long. Users can upload up to 10 audio files at once, provided their combined length doesn't exceed the time limit. Compatible formats include MP3, AAC, and WAV. To begin, users can access Gemini via its website or app, select the upload option, and choose their desired audio file. Once uploaded, a prompt like "transcribe this speech" initiates the process. If an error occurs, retrying usually resolves the issue. Transcriptions are generated quickly, though they may include filler words (e.g., "uhms" and "ahs"). Users can instruct Gemini to clean the transcript by prompting it to remove such filler words. Additionally, Gemini can help summarize the audio or extract key points, making it a versatile tool for various transcription needs.
